3 weeks ago - Taylor Fresh Foods (known colloquially as Taylor Farms) is an American-based producer of fresh-cut fruits and vegetables. It is based in Salinas, California. Taylor Farms was founded by former Fresh Express (now Chiquita) founder and CEO Bruce Taylor in 1995.
